metadata.synopsis: Female Human. Guard and Absolute cultist. Magic user.

0.speaker: Adept Nola
0.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Disgruntled, wants to get on her with work

1.speaker: Adept Nola
1.text: Don't try giving orders, True Soul. Everyone here answers directly to Z'rell.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Stiff, self-important - we technically outrank her but she won't be pushed around

2.speaker: Adept Nola
2.text: I expect to be made True Soul myself by the time the fighting's done. Watch me.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Sees herself as our equal, a little cocky and defiant about it

3.speaker: Adept Nola
3.text: Settle your affairs, True Soul. The waiting's almost over.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Relish, anticipation of the fight ahead
